channel.title: Who has a scooter? e.g Ped
channel.description: Hello there, Who has a Scooter (Ped), I'm only 16 so thats all i am able to drive at this moment, I've got a zip with a tt exhaust, 70kit , malossi racing clutch. I don't currently have a picture of it on my computer but i will take one for you all...

item.title: Who has a scooter? e.g Ped
item.dc:creator: @XharveyX XharveyX
item.description:
@XharveyX wrote:

Good arguements i guess but i live in a quiet town and the bus does it for me since im polish ;p (Y)

Read full topic

item.title: Who has a scooter? e.g Ped
item.dc:creator: @A_Legend A Legend
item.description:
@A_Legend wrote:

Awsome! how fast does you Zip go?

Here’s my Yamaha tzr 50

I’ve had 75mph down a hill.

Read full topic
item.source: Who has a scooter? e.g Ped

item.title: Who has a scooter? e.g Ped
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“OnlyOneRule, post:8, topic:266841”][quote author=Cain_ link=topic=352340.msg2703855#msg2703855 date=1236824991]

Im not here to judge but for those in the UK I dont understand the point in buying a scooter. You use it for a year and spend quite some cash on it and then a year later you are able to drive. Plus, if you spent your money on a scooter it means it will be harder to save cash for driving tests and a car.

Most of them also use way less gas.
[/quote]
I’m not sure about that lol. A 2-stroke uses quite a lot. People think because they’re only 50cc they will do loads. Too be honest, I might only reach 150km on 13litres if I drive too fast.[/quote]

I was approaching 100mpg on mine

Read full topic

item.title: Who has a scooter? e.g Ped
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

XharveyX:

Im not here to judge but for those in the UK I dont understand the point in buying a scooter. You use it for a year and spend quite some cash on it and then a year later you are able to drive. Plus, if you spent your money on a scooter it means it will be harder to save cash for driving tests and a car.

You get a vehicle a year before everyone else.

I agree spending thousands on a race rep ped is pretty dumb, but a cheap knockabout is great fun

Read full topic
item.source: Who has a scooter? e.g Ped

item.title: Who has a scooter? e.g Ped
item.dc:creator: @Waffendennis Waffendennis
item.description:
@Waffendennis wrote:

I used to own a Yamaha Aerox, and a Piaggio Zip.
Both were far from street legal.

The Aerox was a ‘sprinter’.
Had 27.8 SAE BHP.

The Piaggio Zip was a ‘circuit’ moped.
Here in the Netherlands we have races (SBO and SBOW) were we race on a circuit, just like MotoGP. And don’t think it’s going slow… On some circuits you can reach up to speeds ranging from 110 KM/H tot 130 KM/H (depending on the primary and secundary gearing you used on the circuit).

Read full topic

item.title: Who has a scooter? e.g Ped
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

FS1-SE/FS1 “Yankee”

It’s a factory modified FS1E, same frame engine and shit, just different forks, tank, seat etc. Kinda rare so I can’t find a better pic (unfortunately the hard-to-find-parts-for-but-not-desirable-and-expensive rare :/)

Don’t ride it anymore cuz I passed my test 3 years ago, but keep it around for lulz and memories

EDIT: Oh ye mine has the old sports exhaust everyone had on the fizzies (forget the name)

Read full topic
